trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The abomination can breath air and water.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The abomination has advantage on stealth checks in aquatic environments.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Creature Name makes Number and type of attacks

action.name: Ability Description
entries: Attack Style:* Attack Bonus to hit, Reach/Range, one target. *Hit:* Damage Damage Type damage

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The abomination makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its bite.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 8 ({@dice 1d8+4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw against being paralyzed. On a failed save, the creature's body begins to go numb and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is paralyzed for 1 hour.

action.name: Putrid Water Spray (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The abomination unleashes a spray of foul water in a 30-foot line. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 ({@dice 3d10}) necrotic damage and 16 ({@dice 3d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The abomination can track any creature affected by this ability up to 5 miles away for the next 24 hours.
